Author: boxalex#9950
Content: I'am having trouble installing the Ocean wallet on Win10. First i downloaded the wallet, started it and everything was fine and after the intial scan it showed all the adresses/transactions from my agama wallet (which funds i have transfered out due the vulnerability to an exchance). Means no funds there. But it reminded me that it's best to begin with a clean installation and NOT use eventually compromised adresses/keys. Closed the Ocean wallet and deleted ALL references/files from everywhere i had from Agama. Tried to restart the Ocean than, FAIL. Error message. Ok, uninstalled the Ocean wallet as a whole including every possible reference in %appdata%. Unzipped the ocean again, installed and again the same error message. No idea how to fix this, any ideas? Below what i get each time i try to start komodo, wasn't able to find the komodo.config anywhere. Error: Cannot parse configuration file: Missing komodo.conf. Only use key=value syntax.

Author: Decker#3767
Content:
New version of komodo-qt will be released soon (follow the news on this channel), new and improved features upcoming:

- 99.9% compatibility with jl777/beta branch: support most of newest assetchains.
- `convertpassphrase` internal RPC method to obtain WIF from Agama passphrase for import with `importprivkey`.
- **x5-x7** wallet loading speed (big speed improvements at loading block index db stage)
- other minor & major fixes ...

Content: @grewalsatinder if you will have launched komoqo-qt and will use `komodo-cli convertpassphrase %yourpassphrase%`, yes, you will receive a result.

Author: Decker#3767
Content: There is no difference between Windows and Linux versions of komodo-qt. As you are see, it works on Windows too:

Author: Decker#3767
Content:
Make sure that your are used correct ZEXO chain params:
```
komodo-qt-win.exe -ac_name=ZEXO -ac_supply=100000000 -ac_reward=1478310502 -ac_halving=525600 -ac_cc=42 -ac_ccenable=236 -ac_perc=77700 -ac_staked=93 -ac_pubkey=02713bd85e054db923694b6b7a85306264edf4d6bd6d331814f2b40af444b3ebbc -ac_public=1 -addnode=80.240.17.222 
```
and latest version `v2.0.15-rc2-9693cfe` (`v2.0.15-rc2-g28-4`) of komodo-qt.

Author: Raydeon#2053
Content: Installed Komodoocean and its currently synching the headers.  I have my seed from my agama wallet but don't have wallet.dat file.  I can't find a way to reinstall agama desktop wallet.  Are my funds lost?

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: as long as you have your seed safe, your funds are safe

Author: SHossain#0007
Content:
you can use `convertpassphrase` command to convert your seed into privatekey and import into KomodoOceanQT wallet. follow the example below and replace `agama passphrase` with your own seed
```
convertpassphrase "agama passphrase"
```
output:
```
{
  "agamapassphrase": "agama passphrase",
  "address": "RVHPhunndxxmKBU6nCJHtyopYVYWqER8bX",
  "pubkey": "02f5ea0bf2b72d02f1202247cc294a0c8bf9b70b8e5d6a83852f1421a82be63beb",
  "privkey": "c896d95d8be43d21fe4c4a8db38be7de7496755a08b919f40194b5542211aa68",
  "wif": "UvjTortSCah4Zut4omsHvhhEaX5Pk56gmPEmAEUzhd6KVNkCzgvv"
}
```
you need this wif to import using the following guide
https://support.komodoplatform.com/en/support/solutions/articles/29000029939-how-to-import-private-keys-into-komodo-ocean-wallet

Author: Raydeon#2053
Content: @SHossain thank you so much, I'll give it a try

Author: guttermonk#5375
Content: How do you claim your rewards if your rewards address isn't listed in the Pay From drop down in the QT wallet?

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: https://support.komodoplatform.com/en/support/solutions/articles/29000030305-use-komodo-ocean-qt-wallet-to-claim-rewards

Author: guttermonk#5375
Content: I already did that when I transitioned from Agama. Now, when I click "Use available balance" it just takes the "available" balance and not the "reward" balance.

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: until you claim the reward, it can't use the reward value. sending all available fund (not including the accrued reward) will claim the reward

Author: guttermonk#5375
Content: So generate a new receiving address and send my balance to it?

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: you can send to same address.
